conversation.text: Hey Aria! Great to see you!
Oh, it's going well! Just bought this new TV, it'd be great if you could help me set it up!
By the way, what brings you home?
Well actually, I have to kill mom's side of the family to fulfill a blood prophecy.
But I can't really talk to you about it because of that curse mom placed on you where anytime someone mentions blood prophecies you think they're talking about the Mariners.
They're gonna win them all this year, just watch!
